title: Remove transparency from dialogs, dropdowns, and selection menus (solid white surfaces)

requirements.text: Ensure all pop-up dialog panels render with a fully opaque solid white background (no transparency, no blur/"glass" effect), including all modal forms (e.g., Profile Setup, Add/Edit Resident, Add/Edit Medication, Add MAR/ADL/Vitals).

quotes: remove all transparencies in the app. all must be solid white pop-up dialogs, dropdown menus or selection menus

acceptanceCriteria: Every DialogContent panel in the app has an opaque solid white background (opacity 1) in both light and dark modes.
No dialog panel uses semi-transparent Tailwind classes (e.g., bg-*/xx), backdrop-blur, or CSS opacity less than 1.
Spot-check: AddMedicationModal DialogContent remains solid white (currently uses `dialog-solid-white`) and the same behavior is applied consistently to all other dialogs.

requirements.text: Ensure all dropdown menus and selection menus render with a fully opaque solid white background (no transparency) for the menu surface, including Select menus and any dropdown/popover-style menus used across the app.

quotes: remove all transparencies in the app. all must be solid white pop-up dialogs, dropdown menus or selection menus

acceptanceCriteria: All SelectContent / dropdown menu content surfaces are solid white (opacity 1) and readable, with no translucency.
No dropdown/select menu uses semi-transparent Tailwind classes (e.g., bg-*/xx) or backdrop blur for the menu surface.
Visual verification: opening a route selector (e.g., Administration Route) shows an opaque white menu background.

requirements.text: Add/adjust global styling safeguards so that any future dialog/dropdown/select/popover surfaces cannot become transparent due to theme alpha values or component defaults, without modifying any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (read-only).

quotes: remove all transparencies in the app. all must be solid white pop-up dialogs, dropdown menus or selection menus

acceptanceCriteria: No changes are made to files in `frontend/src/components/ui/*`.
Global CSS/theme adjustments prevent transparent popover/menu/dialog surfaces even if a consuming component forgets to pass an explicit solid background class.
After the change, inspecting computed styles for menu/dialog surfaces shows an opaque white background color (no alpha channel) and opacity 1.

constraints: Do not edit any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (these paths are immutable/read-only).
nonGoals: Do not change backend canister logic or data models.
Do not redesign unrelated page layouts or typography beyond what is necessary to eliminate transparency on dialogs/menus.
Do not change print-specific transparency rules unless they directly affect in-app dialogs/menus (print output is out of scope for this request).
